title: Problem Solve
content:
:jigsaw: P [   ] Problem Solve Report
*(Enter the floor number in the first “[   ]”, then for each subsequent “[   ]” enter a quantity and specify “totes” or “U-boats”)*
1. Problem Solve: [   ] 
   – IDRT → problem-solve DZ
2. Damaged/Unscannable Items: [   ] 
   – IDRT → dz-P-DAMAGELAND; U-boats to Damageland
3. Shoes: [   ] *(only if shoe stow isn’t available on your current floor)* 
   – IDRT → dz-P-1A266 / dz-P-1B266 / dz-P-1C266 / dz-P-1D266 
   – U-boats to chosen DZ
4. Library Non-Con: [   ] 
   – IDRT → dz-S-Cubiscan; U-boats to ISS
5. Large Apparel Non-Con: [   ] 
   – IDRT → IB Dock; U-boats to Decant
6. ISS or Hazmat: [   ] 
   – IDRT → dz-P-ISS; U-boats to ISS
7. Jewelry or HRV: [   ] 
   – IDRT → dz-P-2N327 / dz-P-2M327 / dz-P-2N364 / dz-P-2M364 
   – U-boats to chosen DZ
